headlineTxt: Aug 18, 2021, 07:30 ETWorldwide Healthcare Machine Vision System Industry to 2028 - Featuring Baumer, Cognex and FLIR Systems Among OthersThe global healthcare machine vision system market size was valued at $445.6 million in 2019, and is projected to reach $2.50 billion by 2028, registering a CAGR of 23.6% from 2021 to 2028.
